location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, to Henry Moore, East India Company Agent at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter discusses the movement and condition of ships, including the proposed patrol from Bushire down the Gulf. Relays reports from Congoon [Bandar-e Kangan] that Meer Mahanna's [MÄ«r Muhanna] gallivats were seen near Kishmee [Qeshm]. A request for cash is made.
